title: [344. Reverse String](https://leetcode.cn/problems/reverse-string/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
344. Reverse String Description Write a function that reverses a string. The input string is given as an array of characters s.
You must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.
 
Example 1:
Input: s = ["h","e","l","l","o"] Output: ["o","l","l","e","h"] Example 2:
Input: s = ["H","a","n","n","a","h"] Output: ["h","a","n","n","a","H"]  
Constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 105 s[i] is a printable ascii character. Related Topics Two Pointers String Similar Questions Reverse Vowels of a String Reverse String II
